Trustee_17_pre_8.name: Fatima Ali

While I have a history of transparency and ethical behavior, this rejection affects my reputation as I did not fully adhere to the norms of profit-sharing that investors expect. Moving forward, I will ensure that my proposals better align with investor principles to enhance my trustworthiness.
